content.p: Your expert guide to interviews with advice on every step of the process to ensure you have every chance of success. Build your confidence by following our advice on effective preparation Understanding what to expect from an interview can really help you to feel prepared Explore the types of questions asked and how to answer them Practice your interview skills with our online resources Reflect on your interview to identify strengths and areas for improvement Specialist advice to help you prepare for your nursing or midwifery interview telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
